GSP28prakp04u:0: oṃ śrīmatprabhākaragurutantradhurandhareṇa mahāmahopādhyāya-śālikanāthamiśreṇa praṇītā prakaraṇapañcikā nyāyasiddhyākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣamasthalaṭipparāyā
GSP28prakp04u:10: tathā ajātāvapi jātivyavahāro bahulamupalabhyate keṣāñciditi tannirākaraṇāyedamārabhyate /
GSP28prakp04u:13: pūrvapakṣaḥ- nanvāśraya eva dravyaṃ jāterasaditi saugatāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:14: tathāhi na paramāṇuṣu caturvidheṣu pārthivāpyataijasavāyavīyeṣu jātirāśritābhimatā, anuvṛttākārapratyayaviyogāt
GSP28prakp04u:15: bhinneṣu yadabhinnā jātirupeyate, tatrānuvṛttākārāvabhāsinī buddhireva nibandhanam /
GSP28prakp04u:16: na kasyacijjantoḥ paramāṇuṣu karaṇapathavidūravartiṣu nipuṇamapi nirūpayo
GSP28prakp04u:21: na ca sthaleṣu dravyeṣa jātiḥ samaveyāt, teṣāmeva durupagamatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:23: tathā hi---dvyaṇukādikrameṇa sthūladravyārambho 'bhidhīyate, tatra tāvad dravyārambha eva na sādhīyāniti manyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:31: anenaiva mārgeṇa tryaṇukasya trimirdvyaṇukairārambhaṇīyasya mahimaguṇaśālinaḥ sambhavo nirastaḥ
GSP28prakp04u:33: api cāvayavinaḥ kimavayaveṣu pratyekaṃ kārtsnyena vṛttiḥ ? vyāsaṅgena vā ?
GSP28prakp04u:35: na tāvat kārtsnyena vṛttimupalabhāmahe, ekaikāvayavagatasya tasyāpratipatteḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:36: ekaikāvayavagate ca kampe rāge vā sakalasyāvayavinaḥ kamparāgapratītiprasaṅgāt /
GSP28prakp04u:37: tathāvayavāntare ca kamparāgavirahe kamparāgavirahasamāsakteḥ, avayavī kampeta na kampeta, rajyeta na rajyeta ceti viṣamāṃ daśāmāviśet /
GSP28prakp04u:39: avayavāntaraśālino hi kenacidavayavena kvacana, kenacidavayavena kvacaneti vyāsaṅginī vṛttirupapattimatī
GSP28prakp04u:41: kiñca sakalāvayavagrahaṇe eva niyamenāvayavī jñāyeta, na ca tathā
GSP28prakp04u:43: na ca prakārāntareṇa vṛttiriti vadituṃ śakyam; anupapatteḥ prakārāntarasya /
GSP28prakp04u:57: vijṛmbhate, dūrādiva taruṣu nirantareṣu samanubhūyamāneṣu vanamiti matiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:59: api ca jātirapi nendriyajñānaviṣayā pratīyate, tasyā nityatvenābhyupagamāt /
GSP28prakp04u:60: nahi nityaṃ kasmaicitkāryāya paryāptam; taddhi na śaktasvabhāvam, nityaṃ kāryodayaprasaṅgāt
GSP28prakp04u:61: aśaktasvabhāvaṃ tu nityatvādavicikitsayāśaktikaṃ nityaṃ na kiñcit kuryāt /
GSP28prakp04u:63: yo hi viṣayaḥ svasyānvayavyatirekajñānamanukārayati, sa pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:64: kiñca samunmiṣitacakṣuṣaścirāya viṣayāntarānusandhānavyāvṛttacittasya purovartinīṃ svastimatīṃ kālākṣīṃ vā sākṣātkurvāṇasyeva na jātiraparāvabhāsate /
GSP28prakp04u:65: anyacca na jātirasau piṇḍaiḥ sahotpadyate, vinaśyati vā /
GSP28prakp04u:67: ekā59 ca jātiranekādhiṣṭhānā pratijñāyate, utpattimatī vināśinī cānyānyā
GSP28prakp04u:69: seyaṃ nityā jātiruditavatyāṃ vyaktau pratīyamānā nānyata āgatā,
GSP28prakp04u:72: na ca sthitirapi yuktimatī, vyaktireva hi tasyā deśo nākāśādiḥ, anutpannā ca vyaktiriti kvāvatiṣṭhatāmākṛtiḥ
GSP28prakp04u:74: tadeṣā jātiravatiṣṭhate, nāvatiṣṭhate ca, iti saṅkaṭamāpatitam /
GSP28prakp04u:75: kiñca vyakterabhinnā vā ?bhinnā vā ? ubhayarūpā vā jātirāstheyā ? /
GSP28prakp04u:76: tatra nābhinnā; tathābhāve vyaktyā sahotpāde vināśe vā svarūpahāniprasaṅga
GSP28prakp04u:78: vyaktimātrāṅgīkāre ca ko 'smatpakṣasya asya ca bheda ityapi cintayāntaḥ sīdantu bhavantaḥ
GSP28prakp04u:79: ato vyaktimātramevava tattvamiti vadatāṃ sāhāyyakamevācaritamanatirekiṇīṃ jātimurarīkurvāṇaiḥ
GSP28prakp04u:83: kaḥ khalu iha gavi gotvamiti matimabhyupagacchet, anyatra nirastatrapāyantraṇāt bhavataḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:84: bhinnatve ca vṛttiprakāro durnirūpa eva---kiṃ vyāsaṅginī vṛttiḥ ? uta pratyekaparisamāptimatīti
GSP28prakp04u:85: ekatra ca parisamāptāvanyatra na varteteti punarapi svarūpahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:87: pratyekañca gauḥ gauriti pratyayo vikalpamātramityaṅgīkṛtaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp04u:89: na copalambhabalena virodha eva nāstīti caturasram,
GSP28prakp04u:93: tatra yadi vilakṣaṇākārapratītisamaye dve vastunī vilakṣaṇenākāreṇāvabhātastadābhedapratītidaśāyāmeka ākāro 'nubhavanīyaḥ---sa jātibhāgasya ? tatraikasya dviravabhāso 'yaṃ syānna tu jātijātimatorabhedāvabhāsaḥ atha---vilakṣaṇāvapyākārau tādātmyenāvasīyete---iti matam /
GSP28prakp04u:96: śabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tādātmyamiti cet ? 61ayuktamidaṃ, gaurvāhīka ityādāvatādātmye 'pi sāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanāt /
GSP28prakp04u:99: vayantu vivakṣāmātraparatāntrāḥ śabdā na vastuvyavasthāpanāyeśata iti sarvatra manyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:100: kathaṃ tarhi gaurgauriti nānābhūtāsu vyaktiṣu buddhiranuvṛttamākāramullikhantī samupajāyate ? tenāsyā eva buddherdraḍhimnaḥ kāraṇamanumāsyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:101: asti tadviśeṣaṇaṃ yaduparāgavaśeneyaṃ bhinneṣvabhinnākārānusandhāyinī dhīrudīyata iti /
GSP28prakp04u:103: kāryabhūtā hi buddhireṣā kāraṇamākṣipantī yadanantaramevopajāyate tadeva kāraṇaṃ kalpayati, na punarapratītamaparamapi kiñcidupasthāpayati /
GSP28prakp04u:104: sā ceyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanasamanantarabhāvinīti tā eva vyaktayaḥ svanirbhāsā buddhīrupajanayya tanmukhena tāmekākārānubhāsinīṃ dhiyamāvirbhāvayanti /
GSP28prakp04u:105: nitāntabhedavatīnāṃ ca vyaktīnāṃ kāsāṃcideṣa mahimā na sarvāsāmiti kimanupapannam /
GSP28prakp04u:106: yathā hyatyantabhinnā api cakṣurālokamanassaṃyogāḥ ekasāmagrīsamupanipatitā ekavijñānodayalakṣaṇaṃ kāryamārabhante, tathā vyaktayo 'pi kiṃ nārabhanta iti nedaṃ pratipattikaṭhinam /
GSP28prakp04u:107: sā ceyaṃ svākāreṇābhedenātyantikabhedayoginīnāmapi vyaktīnāṃ bhedaṃ samvṛṇotīti saṃvṛtirityanugīyate
GSP28prakp04u:108: eṣā ca manīṣā na svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayīkaroti, tasya viśadāvabhāsitvāt,
GSP28prakp04u:119: tadevaṃ viśadāviśadatayā niyatāniyatatayā ca svalakṣaṇasya vikalpākārasya ca bhede satyapi vikalpāḥ sākṣātparamparayā vā svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanaprabhavatayā svalakṣaṇagrahaṇābhimānino jāyante /
GSP28prakp04u:120: tata eva tatra pravartayantaḥ puruṣaṃ vyavahārāṅgabhāvamanubhavanti /
GSP28prakp04u:123: yathā hi khalu maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇidīptāyāṃ maṇikiraṇaviṣayiṇī maṇibuddhirayathārthatayā bhedamajuṣamāṇāpi maṇimanu pratibaddheti maṇisamadhigamanimittaṃ bhevata, tatheyamapi vastutaḥ svalakṣaṇamagṛhṇatyapi svalakṣaṇāddarśanaṃ, darśanato vikalpa iti
GSP28prakp04u:126: tata eva ca gṛhītagrāhitvādapramāṇam, anyathā vastuviṣayatayā vastuprāpakatayā cānumānamiva pramāṇameva syāt /
GSP28prakp04u:127: sa cāyaṃ tasyākāraḥ prathamāno na jñānasyaiva, bahiṣṭvenāvabhāsāt /
GSP28prakp04u:128: na cārthagata eva; uktena nyāyena nirastatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:130: etacca śāstracintakā vivecayanti, pratipattārastu dṛśyavikalpyāvarthāvekīkṛtya bāhyamevānunyamānā vyavahāreṣu pravartante,
GSP28prakp04u:134: tasmājjātipratyayo vikalpamātram, paramārthatastu na jātirnāma kiñcit /
GSP28prakp04u:136: na ca gandhādivyatiriktaṃ dravyamupalabhāmahe, cakṣurādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ rūpādiṣveva vyāpārāditi pūrvapakṣasaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:139: gavādiṣu ca sthūlākārāvalambinī saṃvidudīyata iti nirvivādam /
GSP28prakp04u:140: nayavīthyāñca nirṇītaṃ pramāṇaṃ smṛtiśca naḥ pratyaya iti /
GSP28prakp04u:146: na punaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsikāryaṃ kāraṇānirūpaṇe 'pahnavamarhati, tenāvayavā eva samāsāditasaṃyogalakṣaṇasādhāraṇaguṇā avayavina utpādakā bhaviśyanti /
GSP28prakp04u:148: ekātiriktānekābhāve 'pyekaiva eva sadvitīya āśrayaḥ saṃyogasyeti na doṣaḥ
GSP28prakp04u:149: nanu dravyaṃ eva tathotpanne saṃyogavikalpamāvirbhāvayato na tadatirekī saṃyogo nāma kaścid guṇaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:151: kādācitkī ca tayorapareyaṃ daśā dṛśyata iti bhavatyeva bhedasiddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:154: 65yaścāyamavayavino vṛttivikalpena doṣa uktaḥ, so 'pyavayavinaḥ pratītau sthitāyāmanupapannaḥ
GSP28prakp04u:156: avayavāntarairapi ca vinā sa tasya ko 'pi mahimā, ya eka evānekāvayavānusyūta iti kiṃ na kalpyate /
GSP28prakp04u:158: saṃyogasacivā evāvayavā janakā āśrayabhūtā yataḥ janakatayaivāśrayatvāt samavāyikāraṇānām
GSP28prakp04u:159: ata eva saṃyogaḥ sadvitīyāśraya iti na doṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:160: na ca sakalāvayavopalambhasāpekṣā tadupalabdhiḥ, avayavinastebhyo bhinnatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:163: kāryasiddhyarthaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ parikalpyate na kāryavināśāya /
GSP28prakp04u:167: pratyekaṃ tu teṣāṃ śakyata evāsahopalambho 'pi vaktum, avayavāntarayogino
GSP28prakp04u:171: avayavī hi sthavīyāneko hṛdayamāgacchati avayavāstu kṣodīyāṃso bhūyāṃsaśca
GSP28prakp04u:172: sa cāyamavayavī mahattvādrūpavattvācca cākṣuṣaḥ spārśano vā, pārthivo vāmbhaso vā taijaso vā /
GSP28prakp04u:177: gaganādīnāṃ tu mahatāmapi rūpasparśavidhuratayā na pratyakṣagocaratetyalamativistareṇa /
GSP28prakp04u:178: nanu sakalāvayavasamāśritatvādavayavinastirohitairavayavaiḥ sahenrdiyāsannikarṣe kathamavayavinā samāgamaḥ? na cāsaṅgatameva bahirindriyamavabodhakamiti pratijñā yujyate,
GSP28prakp04u:183: nanūktaṃ rūpādivyatireki dravyaṃ nopalabhyata iti, kimidaṃ
GSP28prakp04u:187: api ca darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthagrahaṇādrūpasparśavyatireki dravyaṃ sphuṭatarapratītaṃ tat nāpanhotumucitam /
GSP28prakp04u:188: ata eva vanādiṣu bādhakapratyayabalena tatkalpanā na prasaratīti dūratayāntarālāgrahaṇanibandhano 'yamabhedavyavahāraḥ pravartata iti /
GSP28prakp04u:196: athavā na khalviyamājñā rājñaḥ kāraṇabhūtasyaiva pratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyamiti /
GSP28prakp04u:197: yastu yataḥ pratītaye sa tasya viṣaya iti sarvālaukikam /
GSP28prakp04u:200: 'pi bhāvasambhavānniyamena saṃvādāyogāditi bālādabhyupeyaṃ pratyakṣasya kāraṇameva viṣaya iti /
GSP28prakp04u:201: ata eva ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe;
GSP28prakp04u:203: pratyakṣaṃ sākṣādarthena pratibaddham, anumānaṃ tvarthapratibaddhaliṅgajanyatayā pāramparyeṇa pratibaddham /
GSP28prakp04u:204: yasya tu na sākṣāt, nāpi paramparayār'thapratibandhaḥ, na tasya pramāṇyamucitaṃ, tasya tadavisamvādaniyamābhāvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:205: arthāvisamvādi ca pramāṇaṃ vyavajihīrṣamāṇā laukikā ādriyante iti /
GSP28prakp04u:207: yadviṣayameva ca yajjñānaṃ, tenaiva tasmin viṣaye paryupasthāpite nāsti pratyayāntaranibandhanāvisaṃvādaprārthanā
GSP28prakp04u:211: etadarthameva nayavīthyāṃ"sarvaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayāvyabhicāri" iti pratipāditam /
GSP28prakp04u:212: ato nityāyāmapi jātau bhavatyeva pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP28prakp04u:213: yat punaruktam---'ekabhāvena manasā samākalayataḥ kālākṣīṃ svastimatīṃ vā nāsti jātipratītiḥ' iti /
GSP28prakp04u:214: tadasiddham, ākāro hi sā, pratīte cākāre yadi
GSP28prakp04u:217: agrahaṇe 'pi ca dharmasya dharmiṇo grahaṇaṃ nānupapannam /
GSP28prakp04u:218: ata eva ca piṇḍāntarasamadhigame pūrvākāraparāmarśinī manīṣā pratyabhijñāsamākhyātodīyate
GSP28prakp04u:220: cānyasmādanāgacchantī svarūpahāniprasaṅgena vyaktyā sahānupajāyamānā kathaṃ sambandhamanubhavati jātiḥ' iti /
GSP28prakp04u:223: vāsthāṇuśyenayoriva, saṃyogajo vā yathā tantuturīsaṃyogādutpannasya paṭasya turīsaṃyogaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:225: samavāyastu saṃyogādvibhinno na karma, prāksattāṃ vāpekṣate /
GSP28prakp04u:226: yata eva tu piṇḍasyodayaḥ samavāyikāraṇāt, tata eva jātisamavāyo 'pi tasya utpadyate /
GSP28prakp04u:228: 72vinaṣṭāthāmapi vyaktau na jātiranyatra yāti, na ca tatrāvatiṣṭhate, na
GSP28prakp04u:229: vinaśyati, kevalaṃ tadvyaktisamavāyastasyā nivartate tena tasyānupalambhanam /
GSP28prakp04u:235: yacca piṇḍebhyo jāterabhinnatvamubhayarūpatvañca dūṣitam, tadasmākaṃ sāhāyakamevācaritam /
GSP28prakp04u:236: ko hi nāma sacetanaḥ padārthāntarapratyabhijñāmabhedāśrayeṇa sādhayet /
GSP28prakp04u:237: ko vā parasparavirodhinī ekasya dve rūpe pratijānīte /
GSP28prakp04u:242: ataḥ samānendriyagrāhyatayā jātirapi vyaktipratyayānupraveśinīti, na iha pratyayasambhavaḥ
GSP28prakp04u:248: vyaktyantare hi jātiḥ pratīyamānā prācyapiṇḍaparihāreṇa prakāśate /
GSP28prakp04u:249: udīcyapiṇḍaparihārastu prāktanapiṇḍasamadhigamasamaye siddha eveti parihṛtanikhilānupapatitakamupapāditaṃ gavādiṣu sādhāraṇākārānubhavasiddhaṃ jātitattvam /
GSP28prakp04u:252: gaurayamiti ca matirviśadatarārthanirbhāsinī prathata iti cet /
GSP28prakp04u:255: aindriyake tu samvedane pracuratarāvayavarūpāvabhāsādviśadāvagama iti nābāhyaviṣayatvāpattiḥ
GSP28prakp04u:256: nanveṣā jātipratītirbhinnāmeva vyaktimabhedenāvagamayantī jāyata iti bhrāntireṣā na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:257: iyantu bhrāntirnirbījā na yujyata iti bījabhāvena jātiranumīyate,
GSP28prakp04u:264: tatra ca laukikaḥ prayoga eva śaraṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:265: prayogaśca śrutyā lakṣaṇayā gauṇyā vā vṛttyā nānupapannaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:266: samavāyastu bhavatu vastvantare siddhe 'numeyaḥ, pratyakṣeṇa tadanavagamāt /
GSP28prakp04u:271: bhavati hi sarveṣveva satsaditi pratyayānuvṛttiriti saṃvadantaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:274: na ca nānājātīyeṣu dravyeṣu sarṣapamahīdharādiṣu, guṇeṣu gandharasādiṣu vā
GSP28prakp04u:280: 75 76tatrānyaḥ paṇḍitammanyo manyate---nanvidamasamañjasamucyate sarvatra hyupādhibhedamavagamyaupādhikaśabdānuviddhaḥ pratyayo bhavati, na punaḥ prāgeva, saha vā /
GSP28prakp04u:283: kiñca satyapi pramāṇayoge kiñcidastīti gamyate, kiñciccāsīditi,
GSP28prakp04u:285: tatra pramāṇasambandhasya vartamānatvāt sarvatra vartamānasattāpratayayena bhavitavyam /
GSP28prakp04u:286: tadatirekiṇi tu sattve tasya tredhā vyavasthānādyuktastridhāvabhāsaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:287: api ca bhūmitalanikhāteṣu ciratarakālavartiṣu pralīnajñātṛpuruṣeṣuliṅgādirahiteṣu sakalapramāṇapratyastamaye
GSP28prakp04u:292: yadi hi pramāṇasambandha upādhiriti vadema, tata itthamupālamyemahyapi /
GSP28prakp04u:293: yogyatā tu pramāṇasambandhātiriktā pramāṇenāvasīyata iti yukta evāstīti pramāṇodayaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:298: naitadevam; yo hi mahāsāmānyaṃ sattāṃ saṅgirate, so 'pi svarūpasattāṃ padārthānāṃ manyata eva /
GSP28prakp04u:299: anyathā śaśaśṛṅgādīnāmanutpannātivṛttānāñca kimiti mahāsāmānyena sambandha eva na syāditi paryanuyoge, kaḥ parihāraḥ ? tena svarūpasattaiva pramāṇasambandhayogyatā /
GSP28prakp04u:300: yasya hi svarūpamasti, tat pramāṇena paricchidyate /
GSP28prakp04u:301: traikālyamapi svarūpasyaiva yuktam, na ca mahāsāmānyasya, nityatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:302: tathā saṃśayitatāpi tasyaiva, na punarasaṃśayite svarūpe 'paraḥ
GSP28prakp04u:304: atha nityāyā api sattāyāḥ kaḥ sambandho yaḥ sa trikālaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:306: tasmātsvarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabdo na punareka ākāraḥ sattā nāma dravyaguṇakarmaṇām /
GSP28prakp04u:307: 77api ca kāśyapīyānāṃ jātisamavāyaviśeṣeṣu svarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabda ityabhyupagamaḥ
GSP28prakp04u:309: tadevamapākṛte padārthasvarūpātirekiṇi mahāsāmānye sattākhye yat svamanīṣānirmitakutarkabalena sanmātraviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti sādhitaṃ,
GSP28prakp04u:313: yo 'pi cāyaṃ śabdaśabdaḥ, so 'pi śrotragrahaṇopādhilabdhapravṛttiriti na jātu jātikalpanāyai vibhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:315: tattadasādhāraṇābhivyañjakadhvaninibandhanatayā nānāvarṇapeṇa viṣayībhavat tasya tasyārthasyāvagamāya kalpata" iti /
GSP28prakp04u:320: yadapyāhuḥ- 79yadyapyāpātasaṃjātayā dhiyā brāhmaṇyaṃ nāvasīyate, tathāpi brāhmaṇabhūtamātāpitṛsambandhānusandhānaprabhavāyāṃ banddhau taccakāstīti
GSP28prakp04u:324: yaccopadarśitam---yathā vilīnamājyaṃ tailādavyatiricyamānaṃ gandhagrahaṇasahakāriṇā cakṣuṣaiva bhinnamavagamtaya---iti /
GSP28prakp04u:326: nahi tadānīṃ cākṣuṣasya saṃvedanasya viṣayātirekaḥ, kintvanumānameva tatra sarpiṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:327: yastu nipuṇadarśo sūkṣmamapi rūpamīkṣituṃ kṣamaḥ, sa cakṣuṣaivājyajātimapi pratyeti, na gandhagrahaṇamapekṣate /
GSP28prakp04u:331: anādau saṃsāre janyajanakabhāvena vyavasthitāstāvat kāścideva strīpuruṣasantatayaḥ santi, tāsāmanyonyavyatikareṇa jātāḥ strīpuṃsavyaktayo brāhmaṇaśabdavācyāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:332: anidamprathamatayā ca santateḥ sarveṣāṃ tatsantatipatitatvāt siddhā brāhmaṇaśabdavācyatā /
GSP28prakp04u:336: na te parigaṇayya nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyante, kintu lokata eva prasiddhāḥ pratyetavyāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:337: tathā ca tajjanyatve 'vagate brāhmaṇaśabdaṃ prayuñjate lokāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:339: saṃbhavanti hi puṃścalyo striyaḥ pariṇetāraṃ vyabhicarantyaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:342: yatra yāvatyupalabdhisāmagrī, tāvatyāṃ satyāmapi yāsāṃ vyabhicāro na dṛśyate, tāsāṃ nāstyeva vyabhicāra iti lokapramāṇakametat /
GSP28prakp04u:343: api ca apramattaiḥ striyo rakṣaṇīyāstāsu nāstyeva vyabhicārasambhāvanāvakāśaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:345: na caitāvatā yatrāpi niścayaḥ śakyastatrāpyaniścaya iti vaktuṃ yuktamiti /
GSP28prakp04u:346: yacca bahvīṣu jvālāsvekavartivartinīṣu jvālātvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratyabhijñāgocaraḥ kaiścidipyate
GSP28prakp04u:348: sa khalvevaṃ nirīkṣañcakre ananyathāsiddhā buddhiḥ sāmānyakalpanābījam /
GSP28prakp04u:349: iyaṃ tu bhedāgrahaṇena śuktikārajatapratyayavadupapadyata iti nālaṃ sāmānyamaupasthāpayitum
GSP28prakp04u:350: tena bhedagrahaṇapurassaramabhedajñānaṃ bhinneṣu jātyabhyupagame śaraṇamiti niravadyam /
GSP28prakp04u:353: iti śrīmahāmahopādhyāyaśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ jātinirṇayo nāma caturthaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam /
